name: horizontal-carousel
description: Simple horizontal carousel. Supports variable width content! Supports images, divs, lists, videos, whatever element can be a child of <div style='display:flex'>.
scripts_docs: 1. **cut_index** - Copy ./esm/index.js to ./index.mjs (so it does not get converted in next step)
4. **cjs_index** - Convert ./esm/index.js to ./cjs/index.js (so it can get processed without reference to other files)

scripts.build: npm run cjs && npm run browser
scripts.browser: rm -rf .parcel-cache && rm -rf __ && parcel build cjs/* && mv dist __
scripts.cjs: rm -rf cjs && rollup esm/* --format cjs --dir cjs/ --exports auto
